QuestData.Title: The Air Strikes Must Continue
QuestData.Description: We've taken the armory from the enemy thanks to our aerial attacks against the Legion's forces in the Dead Scar.$B$BAs a matter of fact, it's gone so well that we're going to continue our air strikes against them. Take these arcane charges and use them against their forces.$B$BTalk to Ayren Cloudbreaker at the Sun's Reach Harbor when you're ready for flight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Battlemage Arynna wants you to speak to Ayren Cloudbreaker when you're ready to fly over the Dead Scar. Once there, use the Arcane Charges to kill 2 Pit Overlords, 3 Eredar Sorcerers and 12 Wrath Enforcers.
QuestData.RewardText: Any demons we kill today are demons that we do not have to fight tomorrow. Keep it up.
